channel.title: Running server problem, very simple .. my java is a bit rusty atm
channel.description: Ok, when i click runserver.bat it says "cannot find path specified", same with compiler.bat. My current Jdk version is 1.6.0_27, and i have modified it so it says that in the .bat's ... here is the exact coding in the .bats: Compiler [code]@echo off title Compile "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin\javac.exe" -classpath . -d bin server\*.java server\admin\*.java server\content\*.java server\content\skill\*.java server\events\*.java server\hash\*.java server\io\*.java server\model\*.java server\model\npc\*.java server\model\object\*.java server\model\player\*.java server\model\player\command\*.java server\model\player\packet\*.java server\util\*.java server\util\log\*.java server\world\*.java pause cls Compile.bat pause [/code] RunServer [code]@echo off title Shard Revolutions: Run "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -classpath bin server.Server release nogui pause exit [/code]

item.title: Running server problem, very simple .. my java is a bit rusty atm
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“Tech Python, post:1, topic:412173”]Ok, when i click runserver.bat it says “cannot find path specified”, same with compiler.bat. My current Jdk version is 1.6.0_27, and i have modified it so it says that in the .bat’s … here is the exact coding in the .bats:
Compiler

@echo off title Compile "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin\javac.exe" -classpath . -d bin server\*.java server\admin\*.java server\content\*.java server\content\skill\*.java server\events\*.java server\hash\*.java server\io\*.java server\model\*.java server\model\npc\*.java server\model\object\*.java server\model\player\*.java server\model\player\command\*.java server\model\player\packet\*.java server\util\*.java server\util\log\*.java server\world\*.java pause cls Compile.bat pause
RunServer

@echo off title Shard Revolutions: Run "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -classpath bin server.Server release nogui pause exit [/quote]
mabye?

@echo off title Shard Revolutions: Run "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m -classpath bin server.Server release nogui pause exit

@Tech_Python wrote:

Ok, when i click runserver.bat it says “cannot find path specified”, same with compiler.bat. My current Jdk version is 1.6.0_27, and i have modified it so it says that in the .bat’s … here is the exact coding in the .bats:
Compiler

@echo off title Compile "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin\javac.exe" -classpath . -d bin server\*.java server\admin\*.java server\content\*.java server\content\skill\*.java server\events\*.java server\hash\*.java server\io\*.java server\model\*.java server\model\npc\*.java server\model\object\*.java server\model\player\*.java server\model\player\command\*.java server\model\player\packet\*.java server\util\*.java server\util\log\*.java server\world\*.java pause cls Compile.bat pause
